overview: Set within the contemporary world of vintage clothing and social swing dances, Paper Doll is the tale of Edward, a young man who dresses everyday like it's the 1940s. He works a dead-end office job where his colleagues make fun of him but comes alive when he's out dancing, drinking and womanising.  Edward's world is turned upside down when he meets Agatha - the woman of his dreams - who helps him to become the gentleman he's always strived to be, but is she real or just a paper doll?
title: Paper Doll
